original_text: Jewish people want to see God do a miracle. Then they will listen. Gentile people want to listen to a message that has clever ideas. Jewish people want to see God do a miracle. Then they will listen. Gentile people want to listen to a message that has clever ideas.
korean_text: 유대인은 표적을 구하고 헬라인은 지혜를 찾으나

sentences.original_text: Jewish people want to see God do a miracle.
sentences.korean_translation: 유대인들은 하나님이 기적을 행하시는 것을 보고 싶어합니다.

sentences.original_text: Gentile people want to listen to a message
Jewish people want to see God do a miracle.
sentences.korean_translation: 유대인들은 하나님이 기적을 행하시는 것을 보고 싶어합니다.

sentences.original_text: Gentile people want to listen to a message
